dml 0.1.0
  • Reference

Double Machine Learning for Interactive Regression Model.

dml_irm.Rd

Double Machine Learning for Interactive Regression Model.

dml_irm(data, y, d, k = 2, smpls = NULL, mlmethod,
  params = list(params_m = list(), params_g = list()),
  dml_procedure = "dml2", inf_model = "ATE", se_type = "ATE",
  bootstrap = "normal", nRep = 500, ...)

Arguments

data

Data frame.
y

Name of outcome variable. The variable must be included in data.
d

Name of treatment variables for which inference should be performed.
k

Number of folds for k-fold cross-fitting (default k=2).
mlmethod

List with classification or regression methods according to naming convention of the mlr package. Set mlmethod_g for classification or regression method according to naming convention of the mlr package for regression of y on X (nuisance part g). Set mlmethod_m for classification or regression method for regression of d on X (nuisance part m).
params

Hyperparameters to be passed to classification or regression method. Set hyperparameters params_g1 for predictions of nuisance part g1, params_g0 for nuisance part g0, and params_m for nuisance m.
dml_procedure

Double machine learning algorithm to be used, either "dml1" or "dml2" (default).
inf_model

Estimator for final estimation, default average treatment effect "ATE". Alternatively switch to "ATET" for average treatment effect on the treated.
se_type

Method to estimate standard errors (redundant / identical to inf_model).
bootstrap

Choice for implementation of multiplier bootstrap, can be set to "normal" (by default), "none", "Bayes", "wild".
nRep

Number of repetitions for multiplier bootstrap, by default nRep=500.
...

further options passed to underlying functions.
resampling

Resampling scheme for cross-fitting of class ResamplingCV.

Value

Result object with estimated coefficient and standard errors.
